price: Basi waache katika ghafla yao kwa muda.
footnotes: Basi, ewe Muhammad, waachilie mbali makafiri na ujinga wao na kughafilika kwao, maadamu wewe umekwisha wanasihi, mpaka Mwenyezi Mungu awahukumie adhabu baadae.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
